casebody.data:
THE NC STATE BAR
v.
SCOTT. No. 250P15-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Jan. 28, 2016. Robert L. Scott, Greensboro, Attorney at Law, for Scott, Robert L. (Attorney). David R. Johnson, Deputy Counsel, for The NC State Bar. Katherine Jean, Raleigh, Attorney at Law, for The NC State Bar.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 17th of August 2015 by Defendant to Amend the Face Page of the Printed Record in this Appeal:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 28th of January 2016."
